SELECT A.BIN_CampaignID AS campId, A.CampaignCode AS campaignCode, A.CampaignName AS campName, A.CampaignType AS campType, A.State AS campState, A.SaveStatus AS saveStatus, A.IdentifyCode AS identifyCode, A.CampaignFromDate AS startDate, A.CampaignToDate AS endDate, A.CampaignOrderFromDate AS campOrderFromDate, A.CampaignOrderToDate AS campOrderToDate, CASE A.CampaignSetBy WHEN 0 THEN 'BATCH' ELSE C.EmployeeName END AS employeeName, B.ValidFlag AS empValidFlag, A.CampaignSetBy AS createUserId, A.ValidFlag AS validFlag, A.ManageGift AS manageGift, CASE when A.RuleDetail IS null THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS editFlag, CASE A.ValidFlag WHEN '0' THEN CONVERT(varchar(30), A.UpdateTime, 20) ELSE '' END AS updateTime FROM Campaign.BIN_Campaign A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Privilege.BIN_User B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.CampaignSetBy = B.BIN_UserID) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Employee C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.BIN_EmployeeID = C.BIN_EmployeeID) WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.CampaignTypeFlag = 1
A.ValidFlag = #validFlag#
A.CampaignCode = #campCode#
A.CampaignType = #campType#
A.State = #campState#
A.SaveStatus = #saveStatus#

SELECT B.CampaignName AS campName, B.SaveStatus AS saveStatus, B.BIN_CampaignID AS campId, B.CampaignType AS campType, A.SubCampaignName AS subCampName, A.SubCampaignCode AS subCampaignCode, A.SubCampaignType AS subcampType, A.State AS subCampState, A.ValidFlag AS validFlag, T.*
FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_Campaign B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignID = B.BIN_CampaignID) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT C.BIN_CampaignRuleID AS subCampId, MAX(CASE WHEN D.PropertyName = 'baseProp_rese_time' THEN convert(DATE,C.BasePropValue1,120) END) AS reseStartDate, MAX(CASE WHEN D.PropertyName = 'baseProp_rese_time' THEN convert(DATE,C.BasePropValue2,120) END) AS reseEndDate, MAX(CASE WHEN D.PropertyName = 'baseProp_obtain_time' THEN convert(DATE,C.BasePropValue1,120) END) AS obtainStartDate, MAX(CASE WHEN D.PropertyName = 'baseProp_obtain_time' THEN convert(DATE,C.BasePropValue2,120) END) AS obtainEndDate FROM Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition C WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignBaseProp D WITH(NOLOCK) ON(C.BIN_CampaignBasePropID = D.BIN_CampaignBasePropID) WHERE C.PropFlag = '0' AND C.ValidFlag = '1' GROUP BY C.BIN_CampaignRuleID ) T ON (A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = T.subCampId) WHERE B.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND B.CampaignTypeFlag = '1'
A.ValidFlag = #validFlag#
A.SubCampaignCode = #subcampCode#
A.State = #campState#
B.CampaignType = #campType#
A.SubCampaignType = #subcampType#

SELECT BIN_CampaignID AS id, CampaignCode AS code, CampaignName AS name FROM Campaign.BIN_Campaign WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND CampaignTypeFlag = '1'
( CampaignName like '%'+ #campInfoStr# +'%' OR CampaignCode like '%'+ #campInfoStr# +'%' )

SELECT BIN_CampaignID AS id, SubCampaignCode AS code, SubCampaignName AS name FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule WHERE SubCampaignName is not null and SubCampaignCode is not null
( SubCampaignName like '%'+ #subCampInfoStr# +'%' OR SubCampaignCode like '%'+ #subCampInfoStr# +'%' )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Campaign.BIN_Campaign SET ValidFlag = #validFlag#, State = CASE WHEN #validFlag# = '1' THEN 0 ELSE 2 END,
WHERE BIN_CampaignID = #campaignId#

UPDATE Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule SET ValidFlag = #validFlag#, State = CASE WHEN #validFlag# = '1' THEN 0 ELSE 2 END,
WHERE
BIN_CampaignRuleID = #subCampaignId#
BIN_CampaignID = #campaignId#
